node.title: 'I sense a tsunami coming': Some Tasmanians are concerned about border reopening as Premier says 'get ready'
node.alt: A woman on the balcony, with a coffee mug in hand.
node.description: With a month to go before Tasmania's border reopens and the predicted arrival of COVID-19 to the state, there are growing concerns among vulnerable Tasmanians.
node.content:
["With a month to go before Tasmania's border\u00a0reopens\u00a0and the predicted\u00a0arrival of COVID-19 in the state, there are growing concerns among vulnerable Tasmanians.", "Keryn Dickinson has seen how the virus has impacted on family members overseas.", "\"I sense a tsunami coming and that bothers me,\" she said.", "Her eight-year-old\u00a0and five-year-old grandchildren, along with her fully-vaccinated daughter-in-law, contracted the Delta strain of the virus in the UK.\u00a0", "\"They have ... recovered, thankfully,\" she said.", "While fully vaccinated herself, Ms\u00a0Dickinson is concerned about how the virus could impact on her grandchildren in Tasmania.", "\"I worry that they are going to be more vulnerable because they can't be vaccinated at this stage,\" she said.", "Ms Dickinson said people with health concerns would be at risk once the border reopened.", "", "
Keryn Dickinson\u00a0says her grandchildren contracted the Delta strain of the virus in the UK.(Supplied)
", "\"I am a type-1 diabetic, so my immune system is compromised,\" she said.", "\"My beautiful daughter-in-law has gone through a journey with cancer, so her immune system is compromised.", "She said she accessed\u00a0the health care system in Tasmania frequently.", "\"It's stunning how under-equipped it is,\" she said.", "
'Peaks' of COVID to hit early next year, expert says
", "The Australian Nursing and Midwifery Federation (ANMF) in Tasmania shares those concerns.", "It states that given the projections of hospitalisations and ICU care from the Kirby Modelling, many members remain unclear about what additional measures will be implemented to deal with an increase in cases that require hospital and ICU care.", "ANMF said it\u00a0had been\u00a0invited to a union consultation meeting which had\u00a0been scheduled for half an hour.", "Dr Tim Jackson from the Royal Australian College of General Practitioners said once the border opened, there would be \"an immediate wave of COVID in the community\".", "\"I don't think in that period just before Christmas there's going to be a great increase in demand on the health system,\" he said.", "\"But early next year \u2014\u00a0January, February, March \u2014 I think we can expect to get peaks of COVID in the community, and that's really when we're going to need everyone available to do what they need to do.\"", "", "
Premier Peter Gutwein says it's important to get vaccinated.(Getty Images:\u00a0Lisa Maree Williams/Stringer)
", "
'Get ready' for border reopening, Premier says
", "Opposition spokeswoman\u00a0Sarah Lovell\u00a0said people were understandably worried about the capacity of the health system.", "\"We know our health system is already operating at crisis levels every day,\" she said.", "\"An outbreak would put increased pressure on that system.\"", "\"We have not heard from the government any clear plan about how they are resourcing the system to deal with this.\"", "Premier Peter Gutwein said high vaccination rates would be the key to handling the outbreaks.", "\"I've said very clearly that the 15th of December is the date that we'll be re-opening our borders and so I'd say to Tasmanian's, 'get ready for it'.\"", "Mr Gutwein said the health system was in good shape to deal with COVID-19 cases.", "He said the state would have up to 2,500 spaces available for COVID-19 patients with mild symptoms to recover at home.", "Around 400 hospital beds,\u00a0114 ICU beds and 300 ventilators will also be available\u00a0", "\"Our health system is ready,\" he said."]
